name: Orb of Iris
description:
Orb of Iris is a simple and colourful action game where you activate dissipators around your orb to release their energy and keep your orb stable.

Created in 72 hours (although a lot less) for Geta Game Jam 12. 

The theme for this jam was "Unstable".

For Controls and how to play, read the title screen and press I for info.

Everything in this game was made from scratch by Samuel Hollins (Zyro).
